subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Barry Bonds hit a ball over the fence at AT&T Park against the Colorado Rockies right-hander Byung Hyun Kim for the 715th home run of his 21-year major league career.
snippet: Barry Bonds hit a ball over the fence at AT&T Park against the Colorado Rockies right-hander Byung Hyun Kim for the 715th home run of his 21-year major league career.
